title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama API (pip install ollama).

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers (npm install ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (pip install langchain-ollama) giving LLM, embeddings & tool-calling support.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model with multi-user, RAG, plugins.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama: generators & embedders for retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that routes completions through local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI with TUI chat, history, model search & download helpers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app for private RAG: upload PDFs → Ollama embeddings → chat.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Pure-Nim client library for Ollama API with async & streaming support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server + models on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Android client for Ollama (Maven Central: com.github.ollama4j).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# / .NET client with async enumerable streaming (NuGet: OllamaSharp).

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt-python Slack bot that adds /ollama slash command for private LLM chats.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama.

title: ollama-mlflow
summary: MLflow deployment plugin to serve Ollama models behind MLflow REST.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app with chat widget & admin interface backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-sd-webui
summary: AUTOMATIC1111 extension that uses Ollama for prompt generation & interrogation.
